text: Is anyone familiar with source maps? it looks like I need to have one in production to raise my Google Lighthouse score
do you know if there's a way for HubSpot to allow .map files?
Alright, I think I figured out how to add sourcemaps properly (hopefully)
but...is the warning that HubSpot files are missing sourcemaps...
or is it a large "unknown" file that is missing the sourcemap
if it is calling fro one and it isnt there then technicaly its a 404 and causes a pause in total page load time
so i woudl say they arent nessesary to us so why even reference them
